name: Gabapentin

indications.text: gabapentin tablets indicated : postherpetic neuralgia adults ( 1 ) adjunctive therapy treatment partial onset seizures , without secondary generalization , adults pediatric patients 3 years older epilepsy ( 1 )

contraindications.text: postherpetic neuralgia ( 2.1 ) dose titrated needed dose 1800 mg/day day 1 : single 300 mg dose day 2 : 600 mg/day ( i.e . , 300 mg two times day ) day 3 : 900 mg/day ( i.e . , 300 mg three times day ) epilepsy partial onset seizures ( 2.2 ) patients 12 years age older : starting dose 300 mg three times daily ; may titrated 600 mg three times daily patients 3 11 years age : starting dose range 10 15 mg/kg/day , given three divided doses ; recommended dose patients 3 4 years age 40 mg/kg/day , given three divided doses ; recommended dose patients 5 11 years age 25 35 mg/kg/day , given three divided doses . recommended dose reached upward titration period approximately 3 days dose adjusted patients reduced renal function ( 2.3 , 2.4 )

warningsAndPrecautions: gabapentin tablets usp , 600 mg white off-white mottled spots , oval-shaped , biconvex , film-coated tablets debossed 'ze72 ' bisect one side plain bisect side supplied follows : ndc 68382-204-01 bottle 100 tablets child-resistant closure ndc 68382-204-05 bottle 500 tablets ndc 68382-204-10 bottle 1,000 tablets gabapentin tablets usp , 800 mg white off-white mottled spots , oval-shaped , bevelled-edge , biconvex , film-coated tablets debossed 'ze71 ' bisect one side plain bisect side supplied follows : ndc 68382-205-01 bottle 100 tablets child-resistant closure ndc 68382-205-05 bottle 500 tablets ndc 68382-205-10 bottle 1,000 tablets ndc 68382-205-77 unit-dose blister cartons 100 ( 10 x 10 ) unit dose tablets store 20°c 25°c ( 68°f 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . dispense tight container .
indications_original: Gabapentin tablets are indicated for: Postherpetic neuralgia in adults ( 1 ) Adjunctive therapy in the treatment of partial onset seizures, with and without secondary generalization, in adults and pediatric patients 3 years and older with epilepsy ( 1 )
contraindications_original: Postherpetic Neuralgia      ( 2.1 ) Dose can be      titrated up as needed to a dose of 1800 mg/day Day 1: Single      300 mg dose Day 2: 600      mg/day (i.e., 300 mg two times a day) Day 3: 900      mg/day (i.e., 300 mg three times a day) Epilepsy with      Partial Onset Seizures ( 2.2 ) Patients 12      years of age and older: starting dose is 300 mg three times daily; may be      titrated up to 600 mg three times daily Patients 3 to      11 years of age: starting dose range is 10 to 15 mg/kg/day, given in three      divided doses; recommended dose in patients 3 to 4 years of age is 40      mg/kg/day, given in three divided doses; the recommended dose in patients      5 to 11 years of age is 25 to 35 mg/kg/day, given in three divided doses.      The recommended dose is reached by upward titration over a period of      approximately 3 days Dose should be      adjusted in patients with reduced renal function      ( 2.3 , 2.4 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Gabapentin Tablets USP, 600 mg are white to off-white having mottled spots, oval-shaped, biconvex, film-coated tablets debossed with 'ZE72' with bisect on one side and plain with bisect on other side and are supplied as follows:
                  NDC 68382-204-01 in bottle of 100 tablets with child-resistant closure
                  NDC 68382-204-05 in bottle of 500 tablets
                  NDC 68382-204-10 in bottle of 1,000 tablets
                  Gabapentin Tablets USP, 800 mg are white to off-white having mottled spots, oval-shaped, bevelled-edge, biconvex, film-coated tablets debossed with 'ZE71' with bisect on one side and plain with bisect on other side and are supplied as follows:
                  NDC 68382-205-01 in bottle of 100 tablets with child-resistant closure
                  NDC 68382-205-05 in bottle of 500 tablets
                  NDC 68382-205-10 in bottle of 1,000 tablets
                  NDC 68382-205-77 in unit-dose blister cartons of 100 (10 x 10) unit dose tablets
                  Store at 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature]. 
                  Dispense in a tight container.
adverseReactions_original: Known hypersensitivity to gabapentin or its ingredients ( 4 )
